LanguageData.AutopsyHumanoid.label: perform autopsy
LanguageData.AutopsyHumanoid.description: Autopsy a humanoid corpse to obtain organs. This is a respectful medical procedure and does not give negative thoughts.
LanguageData.AutopsyHumanoidBrutal.label: perform brutal autopsy
LanguageData.AutopsyHumanoidBrutal.description: Brutally perform an autopsy of a humanoid corpse to obtain organs, meat and skin.
